remarks: A commutative/associative law for division.  (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 8-Mar-2020.)
statement:
divcld.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) $.
divcld.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) $.
divmuld.3 $e |- ( ph -> C e. CC ) $.
divmulapd.4 $e |- ( ph -> B # 0 ) $.
div32apd $p |- ( ph -> ( ( A / B ) x. C ) = ( A x. ( C / B ) ) ) $.
